stack:stack.stack:script:
[Unit] Description=Stacki iptables starting and stopping After=network.target
[Service] Type=simple ExecStart=/usr/sbin/iptables-restore /etc/sysconfig/iptables
[Install] WantedBy=multi-user.target
if [ -x /usr/bin/systemctl ] then /usr/bin/systemctl disable firewalld /usr/bin/systemctl disable ip6tables /usr/bin/systemctl enable iptables /usr/bin/systemctl enable stacki-iptables.service fi
